info.name: Firefox Button - Reduce Width, Show as tab
info.description: This style reduces the width of the Firefox button to gain visible space. You can also display Firefox button as a tab in maximized windows (affects Windows Aero only). RESTORE AND MAXIMIZE YOUR WINDOW TO LOAD IT PROPERLY This is now a part of my addon Prevent Tab Overflow Unlike other similar styles, this one ensures proper functionality at screen edges. Get more useful tweaks from user 43231
info.additionalInfo:

21/9/11 - Option to show Firefox button as a tab (modified style 53072 for Fitt's law)
8/10/11 - Using min-width=20px, to prevent collapsing with empty label and fit with label Fx
